name: Who turned off the lights
description:
Submission for McGameJam 2022 by team 6 Team members: Lesley Meng, Wenyu Li, Omer Gel, Oliver Guy

 How to play: 

Goal: Get to the exit (green square)

 Press the arrow buttons in the top right of the screen to add arrows to the scene. Drag and drop these arrows around the scene to move your player when they interract. 

Press the "Emergency button" in the top right of the screen to set your character walking. 

Add the crowbar for your character to attack. It can hit the little shooty bois in their houses as well as the large red button for turning off the lasers.

 Fire will kill you. Bullets will kill you. Lasers will kill you at least 9 times out of 10. I hope you have fun with this little puzzle game!

Note: Need to add move tile after attacking
